subject: Re: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
msgSnippet: It has no package. ... one ... package?
messageBody:
It has no package.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...>
wrote:
> Jian Tang wrote:
> > I am using Junit 3.8.1 in windows 2000. My junit test case uses
one
> > class called WPFStatDescriptor. Everything compiles fine. However,
> > when I execute the junit test case, it keeps displaying
> > java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: WPFStatDescriptor.
> >
> > I have include the jar file which has WPFStatDescriptor in the
> > CLASSPATH. I am wondering maybe Junit uses a different JVM? Anyone
> > can help me?
>
> Is WPFStatDescriptor in a named package or the default (unnamed)
package?
> --
> J. B. Rainsberger,
> Diaspar Software Services
> http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
> Let's write software that people understand
